ProjectId.Description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project

Profile.Description: Secret Manager Profile that contains the Atlas Programmatic keys

DatabaseName.Description: Database against which the database user authenticates. Database users must provide both a username and authentication database to log into MongoDB

Username.Description: Human-readable label that represents the user that authenticates to MongoDB

Metadata.Comment: Remember to update the "Roles" and "Scopes" fields with a list of roles that you want to assign to the user
